org.gephi.filters.spi

Interface NodeFilter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ElementFilter<org.gephi.graph.api.Node>, Filter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttributeEqualBuilder.EqualBooleanFilter.Node, AttributeEqualBuilder.EqualNumberFilter.Node, AttributeEqualBuilder.EqualStringFilter.Node, AttributeNonNullBuilder.AttributeNonNullFilter.Node, AttributeRangeBuilder.AttributeRangeFilter.Node, DegreeRangeBuilder.DegreeRangeFilter, GiantComponentBuilder.GiantComponentFilter, HasSelfLoopBuilder.HasSelfLoopFilter, InDegreeRangeBuilder.InDegreeRangeFilter, MutualDegreeRangeBuilder.MutualDegreeRangeFilter, OutDegreeRangeBuilder.OutDegreeRangeFilter, PartitionBuilder.NodePartitionFilter

    public interface NodeFilter
extends ElementFilter<org.gephi.graph.api.Node>
    Basic filters for nodes, that works as predicates. For a given node the filter's role is to return true if the node is kept or false if it is removed.
    Author:
    Mathieu Bastian

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gephi.filters.spi.ElementFilter

        evaluate, finish, init

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gephi.filters.spi.Filter

        getName, getProperties
